input.sentences: everything he needed to make a treat .
then smash the angel food cake down with his hand just so .
frost it and top with apples .
output.sentences: Albert had a sweet tooth so he gathered ingredients rom his cupboard to make a sweet treat.
First, he started with some homemade cake frosting.
Then he took the store bought pound cake, used the knife to smash the top of the cake with his hand to prep his food.
Once he smashed the top of the cake, he began to frost it with the frosting he made earlier and then sprinkle the top with apples.
Finally, he though yum as he prepared to eat his cake treat.
